messages.title: A FAIRER BRITAIN
messages.content: A fairer Britain with Liberal Democrats. Stop Brexit. Build a brighter future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stopping Brexit to secure the future for our children and grandchildren.
Invest in our NHS and Social Care services by stopping Brexit and saving the £50bn Remain Bonus.
Tackle the climate emergency and harness the power of renewables.
Investing more in schools, and 20,000 more police on our streets.
Transform mental health services by treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

issues.brexitEurope: Stopping Brexit. Stronger economy by stopping Brexit.
issues.economy: Secure jobs and the economy by stopping Brexit.
issues.environment: Tackle the climate emergency and harness the power of renewables.
issues.health: Invest in our NHS and Social Care services. Transform mental health services.

endorsements.endorsement: Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve.

quotes.text: Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve.

images.caption: Graham working hard for North East Hampshire.
